name: Trial By Fire (AIE Seattle)
description:
Play as a pyromancer who is attempting to pass their trials and become a true master of the flame! 

                         a first person puzzle game for PC

You will solve a variety of puzzles using fire while avoiding collateral damage of innocent bystander dummies.

This game was created for AIE's minor production with an eight week development period.

  • Trent Wood

  • Michael Ha

  • Jenna Hunter
    • Animator: Hand Animations and Prop Modeling and Texturing
  • Jenée Creviston
    • Environment Artist: Environment Modeling, Texturing and Logo Design

     WASD to move

     Mouse to look around

     Scroll wheel to switch abilities

     Left click to use ability

PC Specs:

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ 
  • Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities 
  • CPU: SSE2 instruction
